DOC.detailed_description: Parameters evaluate : - anthropometric index - glycated haemoglobin , basal postprandial glycemia - lipid profile - small dense LDL ; oxidize LDL - I troponin - red white cell count ; platelet count - creatinin , transaminase , iron - fibrinogen , D-dimer , anti-thrombin III - Hs-CRP , metalloproteinases 2 9 - incidence bleeding
DOC.criteria: nonvalvular atrial fibrillation nondiabetic patient type 1 2 diabetic patient patient cancer patient chronic inflammation disease
